amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt any rule relating to protections for whistleblowers or penalties for retaliation against whistleblowers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 115-20 to exempt any rule relating to protections for whistleblowers or penalties for retaliation against whistleblowers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 231 (Roll no. 112).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 231 (Roll no. 112).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Cummings.
